name: Morning Yoga Flow
description: Start your day with this energizing yoga sequence

steps.title: Mountain Pose
steps.description: Stand tall with feet together and arms at your sides

steps.title: Forward Fold
steps.description: Bend forward from hips, letting arms hang naturally

steps.title: Plank Pose
steps.description: Hold plank position with body in straight line

steps.title: Downward Dog
steps.description: Form an inverted V shape with your body

steps.title: Warrior I
steps.description: Step one foot back and raise arms overhead

steps.title: Tree Pose
steps.description: Balance on one foot with other foot on inner thigh

steps.title: Child's Pose
steps.description: Kneel with knees wide and sit back on heels
